      • accumulateViewportChanges

        public void accumulateViewportChanges()
        Description copied from interface: ScrollingModelEx
        Asks current model to avoid changing viewport position and just remember it instead. That remembered position may be applied later during ScrollingModelEx.flushViewportChanges() processing.
        Specified by:
        accumulateViewportChanges in interface ScrollingModelEx

      • flushViewportChanges

        public void flushViewportChanges()
        Description copied from interface: ScrollingModelEx
        Does nothing if ScrollingModelEx.accumulateViewportChanges() is called before it or if no requests for viewport location change arrived since the last time ScrollingModelEx.accumulateViewportChanges() is called.

        Applies remembered viewport location change request to the editor.

        Specified by:
        flushViewportChanges in interface ScrollingModelEx

      • addScrollRequestListener

        public void addScrollRequestListener(ScrollRequestListener scrollRequestListener,
                                     Disposable parentDisposable)
